oaidtb.boosters
Class RealAdaBoost

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--weka.classifiers.Classifier
        |
        +--weka.classifiers.DistributionClassifier
              |
              +--oaidtb.boosters.Booster
                    |
                    +--oaidtb.boosters.RealAdaBoost
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IterativeUpdatableClassifier, MulticlassExtensibleBooster, weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable, weka.core.WeightedInstancesHandler
public class RealAdaBoost
extends Booster
implements MulticlassExtensibleBooster

Class for boosting using RealAdaBoost; it uses class probability estimates (so it needs a DistributionClassifier as base classifier) to construct real valued contributions of each base classifier. For more information see:

Jerome Friedman, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani: Additive logistic regression: a statistical view of boosting. The Annals of Statistics, 38(2): 337-374, April 2000.

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé
See Also:
